title: Survival: Wisdom/Knowledge
marks:
Signature, Inscription, Edition, Stamp and Chop
 LRC,  in pencil: [Jaune Q T S Smith]
description: red bar at left; grey bar at right; black blocks in URC and LLC; small dark pink square, LRC; \"Wisdom\" and \"KNOWLEDGE\" at top; male and female Native American figures flanking boy with hoop, squared-off robot-like figure and clown in grey at bottom; sketchy abstracted black figure in ULQ with oval on chest; skeletal figures in white at right; teepee surrounded by figures enclosed in walls with mathematic symbols, URC
creditline: The Patricia and Peter Frechette Endowment Fund and the James and Maureen Duffey Endowment for Prints and Drawings
